[all]

start_file=start4.elf
fixup_file=fixup4.dat
kernel=Image
initramfs rootfs.cpio.zst

uart_2ndstage=1

disable_overscan=1

dtoverlay=krnbt=on
dtoverlay=vc4-kms-v3d-pi4
dtoverlay=imx219

arm_64bit=1

[pi4]

[all]
